description: Steps and configuration to create a complete wifi users dashboard in GRAFANA from ARUBA wireless switches infraestructure.

targets.query: SELECT mean("Users") FROM "1year"."wifi_users" WHERE ("UserRole" =~ /^\w/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m), "UserRole" fill(previous)
SELECT sum("Users") FROM "1year"."wifi_users" WHERE ("UserRole" = 'select tag value') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(previous)
SELECT count("UserName") FROM "wifi_users" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m), "DeviceType" fill(linear)
SELECT sum("Users") FROM "1year"."DiffRadio" WHERE ("PhyType" = '1' AND "HTMode" = '1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(linear)
SELECT sum("Users") FROM "1year"."DiffRadio" WHERE ("PhyType" = '1' AND "HTMode" = '3') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(linear)
SELECT sum("Users") FROM "1year"."DiffRadio" WHERE ("PhyType" = '1' AND "HTMode" = '5') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(linear)
SELECT sum("Users") FROM "1year"."DiffRadio" WHERE ("PhyType" = '1' AND "HTMode" = '5') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(linear)
SELECT sum("Users") FROM "1year"."DiffRadio" WHERE ("PhyType" = '1' AND "HTMode" = '5') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(linear)
SELECT sum("Users") FROM "1year"."DiffRadio" WHERE ("PhyType" = '1' AND "HTMode" = '5') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(linear)
SELECT sum("Users") FROM "1year"."DiffRadio" WHERE ("PhyType" = '1' AND "HTMode" = '5') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(linear)
SELECT sum("Users") FROM "1year"."DiffRadio" WHERE ("PhyType" = '1' AND "HTMode" = '5') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(linear)
SELECT sum("Users") FROM "1year"."DiffRadio" WHERE ("PhyType" = '1' AND "HTMode" = '5') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(linear)
SELECT sum("Users") FROM "1year"."DiffRadio" WHERE ("PhyType" = '1' AND "HTMode" = '5') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(linear)
SELECT sum("Users") FROM "1year"."DiffRadio" WHERE ("PhyType" = '1' AND "HTMode" = '5') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(linear)
SELECT sum("Users") FROM "1year"."DiffRadio" WHERE ("PhyType" = '1' AND "HTMode" = '5') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(linear)
SELECT sum("Users") FROM "1year"."DiffAuth" WHERE ("SubAuthenticationMethod" = '1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(linear)
SELECT count("UserName") FROM "wifi_users" WHERE ("EncryptionMethod" = '0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(linear)
SELECT count("UserName") FROM "1day"."wifi_users" WHERE ("UserUpTime" < 3600) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(previous)
SELECT "UserName" FROM "wifi_users" WHERE ("UserUpTime" > 3600 AND "UserUpTime" < 7200) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT count("UserName") FROM "1day"."wifi_users" WHERE ("UserUpTime" > 86400 AND "UserUpTime" < 604800) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(previous)

title: Aruba Wifi Users
